title: 2x Slow Cooked Beef Brisket in Stout Gravy
description: We’ve taken that most old-fashioned of cuts, a traditional beef brisket, and transformed it into a dish you’d be delighted to receive in any top restaurant. We’ve sealed it up in a thick, glossy sauce, rich in the punchy flavours of dark stout and a whole sprig of fresh rosemary, and cooked it ever so gently ‘sous vide’ for hours on end. The result? Comfort on a plate!

title: Marinated Salmon Fillet Selection
description: The finest firm-fleshed, quality Scottish salmon, marinated to create these pan-ready fillets, available in three delicious, gourmet flavours.

title: 2x packs Free-range Chicken Breast Fillets
description: Naturally lean portions of one of the nation's favourite cuts - you'll notice the difference our flavourful chicken will make to your everyday meals.
